snippet.title: The Return of the Puppet Masters – Phenomena
snippet.description: Are brain parasites altering the personalities of three billion people? The question emerged a few years ago, and it shows no signs of going away. I first encountered this idea while working on my ...

snippet.title: Rapamycin – the Easter Island drug that extends lifespan of ...
snippet.description: Rapamycin, a drug isolated from an Easter Island soil sample, can extend the lifespan of mice by 9-14%, even if they were already the mouse-years equivalent of a 60-year-old human.
